史密夫路：紅變黃令我鬆口氣

【Now Sports】阿仙奴在周六英足盃第3圈主場出擊，加時以2:0擊敗紐卡素，史密夫路差點做罪人，之後卻變成英雄。
史密夫路（Emile Smith Rowe）今場後備入替，於下半場補時3分鐘侵犯中場朗史達夫，球證原本判紅牌，但VAR改判黃牌。大難不死，這名年輕攻中在加時做英雄，為阿仙奴打破缺口。

「我真的很高興，之前的紅牌被推翻，讓我鬆了一口氣，因為我那動作真的不是故意。我很高興能入球，幫助球隊晉級下一圈。」史密夫路表示。

阿仙奴今場陷入困境，雖然取得大部份控球權，但直未能撕破紐卡素的防線，史密夫路說：「我們知道今場會有多艱難，他們是強勁的對手，勝負關鍵是如何擊潰他們的防守。」

「今場顯示了我們是多麼團結，我們一直在場外努力拉近球員間的距離。」史密夫路補充。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

阿仙奴後悔嗎? " 養老巨星" 18小時0進球 傳球送對手

阿仙奴今日2-0淘汰了紐卡素，成功晉級足總杯第4輪，但這場勝利卻和韋利安沒什麼關係。此役，韋利安正選出場，但表現一如既往的糟糕，踢了一個小時後就被換下場。數據顯示，他加盟阿仙奴後出場18次僅射正2次，一個進球都沒有，很難不讓人懷疑他加盟阿仙奴就是來養老的。


2020年夏天，韋利安和車路士合同到期，阿仙奴將其免費簽下。或許是考慮到沒有掏一分錢轉會費，阿仙奴慷慨的給了韋利安22萬鎊的周薪，這個薪資高居槍手隊內第二位。在英超所有球員中，韋利安的薪水也排到了第9位，比所有利物浦球員都要高。儘管如此，阿仙奴仍認為自己撿到了個寶。

本賽季英超首輪，韋利安的表現十分驚艷，送出2次助攻，幫助槍手3-0幹翻富咸，他也被評為了那場比賽的最佳球員。然而，那場比賽卻也是韋利安至今在阿仙奴唯一踢得不錯的比賽。此後，他就進入了養老模式，進攻效率低下，防守不夠賣力……槍迷無數次的要求阿迪達將其拿下，但達叔並不採納。

今日對陣紐卡素，韋利安還是拿到了正選出場的機會，他的發揮簡直慘不忍睹。第6分鐘，阿仙奴前場任意球，主罰地點就在大禁區前沿。比比、大衛雷斯、韋利安等人都站在皮球前，隨後大衛雷斯虛晃一槍，韋利安在身後大力射門，他的射門角度太差，直接踢在了人牆身上。


第24分鐘，阿仙奴右路進攻，奧巴美羊右路抽射被扑出，隨後韋利安在禁區內左側拿球，無人防守的他沒有第一時間射門，而是往底線帶了一步，然後小角度抽射，然後就沒然後了，球飛上了天空……


更讓人無語的一幕是韋利安竟然把球直接傳給了對手。當時，比比後場帶球，跑了好一陣後，他把球交給了中線附近的韋利安。韋利安拿球後，想再把球交給比比，但他的傳球角度和力度都不好，皮球直接被對手給拿下。對於韋利安的這個騷操作，比比是一臉的無語。丟球後，韋利安回防的速度也讓槍迷很生氣，他慢慢的往回跑。


第65分鐘，阿迪達實在不能忍了，將韋利安換下。在場上將近一個小時的時間裡，韋利安給球隊的貢獻幾乎為0，1次射門，0次射正，0次創造機會，0次成功突破，0次精準的長傳球……賽后的評分，韋利安毫無懸念的拿到了全隊最低分（6.2分）。根據統計，韋利安來到阿仙奴後累計出場18次，總出場時間為18.5個小時，期間只有2次射正，0進球，3助攻。

當韋利安去年夏天加盟阿仙奴的時候，槍迷都很開心，而車路士球迷則怒罵高層豬腦子。現在，兩隊球迷的態度完全反了過來，槍迷批高層在引援前工作沒做到位，而藍軍球迷則誇林伯德早就洞悉了一切。在點評比賽的時候，槍手名宿伊恩-胡禮直言：“比比和韋利安的表現都很糟糕。本來期望他們能給球隊帶來幫助，說實話這根本沒有發生。”

是否會棄用韋利安呢？阿迪達的回答讓槍迷很崩潰：“我們會和他一起努力，他在訓練中展現了自己有多麼想參加比賽，我們需要對他保持耐心。我們知道他是怎樣的一個球員。”

阿迪達預期馬天尼利長唞：他哭了

【Now Sports】阿仙奴翼鋒馬天尼利再度受傷，疑似手尾長，領隊阿迪達透露他在醫療室流下男兒淚。
馬天尼利（Gabriel Martinelli）原本在周六英足盃第3圈鬥紐卡素正選披甲，但賽前熱身時受傷，最終被域斯尼爾遜頂上。阿仙奴賽後證實，這名19歲巴西小將足踝受創。

阿迪達表示：「賽前我在辦公室，一位助教進來說馬天尼利扭傷了脚踝。我立即去醫療室，他哭了，看起來情況不太好。他當時很痛苦，我們得看看他怎麼樣，相信不會有好消息。」

馬天尼利在上季受嚴重膝傷，休養了6個月，直到去年12月才能夠復出，阿迪達說：「我希望周一得知他的傷勢。他是一名永遠都想踢下一場的球員，甚麼都不在乎，能夠承受痛苦，希望沒有甚麼太嚴重的事情。」

圖片來源 : ©AFP

Xhaka - Smith Rowe is so important to us

Granit Xhaka heaped the praise on Emile Smith Rowe after the youngster continued his excellent form with the opening goal against Newcastle.

Emile's run in the team has coincided with our upturn in form, and he once again showed his value to the side with a well-taken goal, just ten minutes from the end of extra-time.

After the game Xhaka was delighted for the 20-year-old academy product.

"He's a lovely guy," Xhaka told Arsenal Media. "He's a very good guy who wants to improve, he listens to us experienced players a lot and he's so important to us.

"You can see how many balls he recovers, how many key balls he plays at the front and for the front guys as well, he's so important. He has to keep going like this to improve day-by-day but he has a good mentality and that's very important as well."

https://www.arsenal.com/news/xhaka-smith-rowe-so-important-us

'You need your keeper in key moments'

Mikel Arteta was all smiles after overseeing our fourth successive win, and was quick to highlight the contribution of his goalkeeper in the 2-0 victory over Newcastle.

Bernd Leno played his first-ever FA Cup match, and made a crucial save from Andy Carroll in the 90th minute to send the game to extra-time.

It laid the platform for us to go on and score twice in the final ten minutes to book our place in the fourth round.

"We had to patient," the boss said at full-time. "They are a team who are well-organised and make it hard for you. We had the chances I think, very big chances to score much earlier but when you don't do that, the game is open.

"If you don't do that in your box, you need your keeper in a key moment - like it happened after the corner kick on the counter - to save you.

"Bernd did it in a magnificent way and at the end we scored two and deserved to go through."

It means Arteta has won all seven FA Cup matches he has taken charge of, but it's back to Premier League action on Thursday.

"Let's go game by game and see who we get in the draw.

"It's great to keep the momentum going, to keep winning and keep the boys' confidence high. Now we have Palace, five days to prepare, let's go for it."

Not long after Mikel Arteta blamed Folarin Balogun’s agent for the problems securing a deal, The Athletic popped up with an excusive claiming the player was on the verge of signing a pre-contract with a foreign club in a piece that absolutely stank of agent games, but was it?

Look, I have no information and feel I should say that up front. I just pay attention and piece things together. Sometimes I’m right, sometimes I’m wrong. I’ve only been following football for 41 years and writing about it for almost 13, what do I know?

Caveats out of the way, it stunk, didn’t it?

At his pre-Newcastle United press conference on Thursday Mikel Arteta spoke about Balogun and his contract. He was surprisingly frank and seemed only too willing to heap the blame onto Balogun’s agent even though he said that wasn’t what he was doing.

“You need three parties to make a deal,” Arteta said. “For sure, the club wants to make a deal, the manager wants to make a deal, the player wants to stay and I’m not sure about the agent.

“I’m not saying he’s stopping [a deal]. I’m saying that we need to find an agreement with him. We are negotiating with an agent, with a player that wants to stay at the club and we need to find an agreement.

“I’m telling you that we are doing everything we can to keep him here and hopefully from the other part they are doing the same and they defend the same interests, which is the players’ interest, which is to stay at the football club and be successful with us.”

Within a couple of hours of these comments The Athletic dropped the following: “Arsenal striker Folarin Balogun is close to signing a pre-contract agreement to join a foreign club, David Ornstein and James McNicholas can reveal.”

The only other bit of information that could be considered ‘new’ was the addition of “The [Arsenal] contract offer has not improved substantially in recent months, nor has it come close to meeting the player’s demands.”

They mention that Balogun also has concerns over the amount of playing time he has been given but this has been a consistent complaint throughout this saga.

There is no mention of how they came across this information, but neither has a habit of just making stuff up so it is reasonable to assume it has come from somewhere. That it did so quickly after Arteta’s comments would seem to indicate that Balogun’s agent is involved somewhere.

Just after Christmas, it was reported on The Beautiful Game that Balogun was in talks with Sven Mislintat at Stuttgart. The podcast have had a number of stories concerning Balogun that lead you to believe they have a source inside the Balogun camp.

This story never really got picked up but it certainly adds more weight to Thursday’s claims and seems to indicate there is more truth to the recent story than just an agent trying to extract more from Arsenal.

Of course, it could still be that as well, but with Sven Mislintat involved, there is very real concern the player could actually be on his way.

From Dan Critchlow who has been monitoring this situation closely:

“I’ve said from the start that I think all sides have a share of the blame for the situation so far.

“Arteta could obviously be giving Balogun more chances, and we know Arsenal’s hierarchy screwed up negotiations early this year. At the same time, Balogun’s camp put them in a difficult situation from the start.

“Normally, players sign their first professional contracts right after they turn 17 (July 2018 in this case), but Balogun delayed his for months before eventually signing in February 2019.

“You can’t sign for longer than three years with your first professional contract, so he could only commit to 2021. As a result, Arsenal basically had to push him to sign another contract immediately after his first one.

“Again, Balogun delayed, until Arsenal’s negotiator Huss Fahmy lost patience and ended talks in early 2020.

離「廠」在即？奧燒哥哥露端倪

【Now Sports】奧斯爾1月離開阿仙奴的傳聞傳得熱哄哄，其哥哥日前疑似在個人社交網絡Instagram公佈他的去向。
德國中場奧斯爾（Mesut Ozil）本季未獲所屬球會阿仙奴為他註冊，從而未曾代表球會上陣，令他1月冬季轉會窗離隊，事在必行。周六晚奧斯爾的哥哥Mutlu在其個人社交網絡Instagram的限斯動態中，上載了一張土超費倫巴治球會的隊徽，加上一個眨眼的表情符號，暗示奧燒轉戰土耳其一事已接近成事。

外界早已盛傳奧斯爾獲土超費倫巴治、美職華盛頓聯賽斟介，而其經理人蘇古特亦承認正在接洽其他球會。貴為阿仙奴最高周薪球員的他，與球會的合同將於今夏屆滿，領隊阿迪達如果相關交易對球會及球員達成雙贏局面的話，將允許奧斯爾在冬季轉會窗離開，不過後者曾公開揚言期望等到約滿才離隊。

SMITH ROWE: I’M REALLY HAPPY TO BE PLAYING FOR THIS CLUB

Substitute Emile Smith Rowe had a red card overturned by VAR before netting in extra time as Arsenal beat Newcastle 2-0 at the Emirates to secure a place in the FA Cup 4th round.

After the game, the young midfielder chatted to BBC Sport. Here’s what he had to say.

On a roller coaster evening for him…

I was really happy [to score] it was a bit of a relief for me obviously after the incident before which wasn’t ideal. It wasn’t intentional. I’m happy to get the goal and happy to go through to the next round.

On Newcastle being difficult opponents…

They were very difficult. We knew coming into the game how tough it was going to be. We know they are a strong opponent, so yeah, it was just about breaking them down. We got there and I’m happy with the win.

On being part of Arsenal’s revival…

It’s great, from a young kid I’ve always wanted to play for this club. All the young players, it’s good for us to get opportunities so I’m really happy to be playing for this club.

On grinding out a win…

It just shows how together we are, we’ve been working off the pitch to get closer as a group. It’s starting to show on the pitch and as a group, we’re so happy to win games, we’ve just got to keep it going.

quote.msg:
阿仙奴後悔嗎? " 養老巨星" 18小時0進球 傳球送對手

阿仙奴今日2-0淘汰了紐卡素，成功晉級足總杯第4輪，但這場勝利卻和韋利安沒什麼關係。此役，韋利安正選出場，但表現一如既往的糟糕，踢了一個小時後就被換下場。數據顯示，他加盟阿仙奴後出場18次僅射正2次，一個進球都沒有，很難不讓人懷疑他加盟阿仙奴就是來養老的。


2020年夏天，韋利安和車路士合同到期，阿仙奴將其免費簽下。或許是考慮到沒有掏一分錢轉會費，阿仙奴慷慨的給了韋利安22萬鎊的周薪，這個薪資高居槍手隊內第二位。在英超所有球員中，韋利安的薪水也排到了第9位，比所有利物浦球員都要高。儘管如此，阿仙奴仍認為自己撿到了個寶。

本賽季英超首輪，韋利安的表現十分驚艷，送出2次助攻，幫助槍手3-0幹翻富咸，他也被評為了那場比賽的最佳球員。然而，那場比賽卻也是韋利安至今在阿仙奴唯一踢得不錯的比賽。此後，他就進入了養老模式，進攻效率低下，防守不夠賣力……槍迷無數次的要求阿迪達將其拿下，但達叔並不採納。

今日對陣紐卡素，韋利安還是拿到了正選出場的機會，他的發揮簡直慘不忍睹。第6分鐘，阿仙奴前場任意球，主罰地點就在大禁區前沿。比比、大衛雷斯、韋利安等人都站在皮球前，隨後大衛雷斯虛晃一槍，韋利安在身後大力射門，他的射門角度太差，直接踢在了人牆身上。


第24分鐘，阿仙奴右路進攻，奧巴美羊右路抽射被扑出，隨後韋利安在禁區內左側拿球，無人防守的他沒有第一時間射門，而是往底線帶了一步，然後小角度抽射，然後就沒然後了，球飛上了天空……


更讓人無語的一幕是韋利安竟然把球直接傳給了對手。當時，比比後場帶球，跑了好一陣後，他把球交給了中線附近的韋利安。韋利安拿球後，想再把球交給比比，但他的傳球角度和力度都不好，皮球直接被對手給拿下。對於韋利安的這個騷操作，比比是一臉的無語。丟球後，韋利安回防的速度也讓槍迷很生氣，他慢慢的往回跑。


第65分鐘，阿迪達實在不能忍了，將韋利安換下。在場上將近一個小時的時間裡，韋利安給球隊的貢獻幾乎為0，1次射門，0次射正，0次創造機會，0次成功突破，0次精準的長傳球……賽后的評分，韋利安毫無懸念的拿到了全隊最低分（6.2分）。根據統計，韋利安來到阿仙奴後累計出場18次，總出場時間為18.5個小時，期間只有2次射正，0進球，3助攻。

當韋利安去年夏天加盟阿仙奴的時候，槍迷都很開心，而車路士球迷則怒罵高層豬腦子。現在，兩隊球迷的態度完全反了過來，槍迷批高層在引援前工作沒做到位，而藍軍球迷則誇林伯德早就洞悉了一切。在點評比賽的時候，槍手名宿伊恩-胡禮直言：“比比和韋利安的表現都很糟糕。本來期望他們能給球隊帶來幫助，說實話這根本沒有發生。”

是否會棄用韋利安呢？阿迪達的回答讓槍迷很崩潰：“我們會和他一起努力，他在訓練中展現了自己有多麼想參加比賽，我們需要對他保持耐心。我們知道他是怎樣的一個球員。”

Puig to Arsenal? Koeman says he has no problem with Barcelona outcast

Barcelona manager Ronald Koeman insists that he has no problem with Arsenal-linked midfielder Riqui Puig, despite the youngster’s lack of action.

Koeman remarked on Friday that Barca’s younger players should look to move clubs in January in order to earn game-time they won’t get at Camp Nou.

This was interpreted as a message for Puig, who Koeman had told as early as last summer that he was not in his first-team plans.

Puig has been heavily linked with a number of big clubs in Europe, including Milan, Leeds and, in particular, Arsenal.

“It’s as if I have a problem with him and that is not the case,” Koeman insisted on Saturday.

“I spoke about young players in general, like Konrad, Junior, Matheus. They haven’t played many minutes, either, but you always pick one name. It’s not good for me or for Riqui.

“I want the best for every player and there’s no problem, but it depends on each player and they have to be in agreement [about what’s best].”

The 21-year-old Puig has been handed just 22 minutes of action in La Liga this season.

He has been compared in style of play to Barcelona legend Andres Iniesta.

講workrate都係T仔贏

講傳中質素 唔洗比T仔一定完勝

講速度
T仔點止係屈速 佢係屈變速
對面貼住你又爆得過 逗後守既又可以傳中

阿迪達誓助比比成材

【Now Sports】阿仙奴領隊阿迪達期望，能夠幫助貴價翼鋒尼高拉比比成長，達到眾人心中的期望。
雖然挾阿仙奴史上最高轉會費7200萬鎊從里爾來投，但尼高拉比比（Nicolas Pepe）一直未能踢出身價，遊走於正選與後備之間，首季只能攻入8球，今季同樣令人失望。

阿迪達表示：「我們希望幫助比比成功，要做到就要給予他上陣時間，他需要球隊足夠穩定，這樣才能夠展出實力，看看之後數月的發展如何吧。」

比比今季在英超只曾4次擔正，對上2場聯賽勝仗都無份參與，阿迪達認為在這樣的情況，難以對他下評語：「他在每場比賽都努力嘗試，有過不少精采時刻。在正常的情況，以他的質素應該可以建功，可惜沒有，但我認為他的整體貢獻仍很好。」

圖片來源 : ©AFP

3-year-deal agreed: Arsenal defender squad saga to end

According to a report from Turkey, Sokratis has agreed a three-year deal with Fenerbahce.

Earlier this week it was reported that Sokratis could be off to Genoa in Italy. Now, they are reporting in Turkey that a deal has been agreed that will see the Greek defender pull on the yellow and navy of Fenerbahce for the next three seasons.

Just a few days ago it was claimed that the 32-year-old was leaning towards a move to Genoa rather than any of the other options he had been presented with so this would represent another change in this rather tedious story.

Genoa were said to be offering Sokratis a two-and-a-half-year deal and, had terms been equal he would have opted for the Italians.

Either way, he’s certainly on his way and it will bring to an end one part of this season’s squad saga.

Another 19yo’s contract causing problems for Arsenal

Arsenal are facing another youth contract issue with Arthur Okonkwo, who currently appears to be the club’s third-choice goalkeeper

AllNigeriaSoccer report that Arthur Okonkwo’s Arsenal contract expires this summer. The club have offered him a new three-year deal, but he’s yet to sign it at this stage.

Okonkwo appears to be edging closer to a first-team debut after Matt Macey’s January exit. The 19-year-old was the third-choice goalkeeper for Saturday’s match against Newcastle United after training with the first team during the week.

To give some brief background on the situation, Okonkwo has always been a highly-rated goalkeeper at Arsenal. However, he missed the entirety of last season with a health condition.

The teenager finally made his return to the pitch in a win over Crawley Town in October, but he then missed a few games due to disciplinary reasons. He returned to start the final two u23 games of the year against Derby and Leicester City.

Arsenal have won all seven u23 games featuring Okonkwo, and he’s kept three clean sheets and conceded just four goals in those matches.

Karl Hein is also a talented young goalkeeper, so the two of them are competing for chances under Mikel Arteta. But they’ll both get a boost from Macey’s departure, opening up a pathway to take on Runar Alex Runarsson for the backup spot.

With Okonkwo’s contract situation, though, it looks like Arsenal could face his departure if he doesn’t get chances.

replies.msg: 佢份約好似今年暑假完

Now Sports】阿仙奴領隊阿迪達期望，能夠幫助貴價翼鋒尼高拉比比成長，達到眾人心中的期望。
雖然挾阿仙奴史上最高轉會費7200萬鎊從里爾來投，但尼高拉比比（Nicolas Pepe）一直未能踢出身價，遊走於正選與後備之間，首季只能攻入8球，今季同樣令人失望。

阿迪達表示：「我們希望幫助比比成功，要做到就要給予他上陣時間，他需要球隊足夠穩定，這樣才能夠展出實力，看看之後數月的發展如何吧。」

比比今季在英超只曾4次擔正，對上2場聯賽勝仗都無份參與，阿迪達認為在這樣的情況，難以對他下評語：「他在每場比賽都努力嘗試，有過不少精采時刻。在正常的情況，以他的質素應該可以建功，可惜沒有，但我認為他的整體貢獻仍很好。」

阿迪達懶理奧燒談去留：我冇Twitter！

【Now Sports】奧斯爾暗示周一將在Twitter公佈前途，但阿仙奴領隊阿迪達一於懶理。
盛傳奧斯爾（Mesut Ozil）今月離開阿仙奴，目的地為費倫巴治或華盛隊聯隊。這名前德國國腳攻中周一將於Twitter設問答環節，「我們會談及過去、現在、將來。」

阿迪達對此似乎不太關心：「對不起，我沒有留意Twitter。奧斯爾之前已經做過Twitter Q&A，他用來跟球迷聯絡感情。」不過，其實這位少帥擁有一個已認證的Twitter賬戶，而且追蹤了奧燒。

兵工廠在周四英超主場迎戰水晶宮，翼鋒馬天尼利、中堅加比爾、防中湯馬斯都有望回歸戰陣。阿迪達指，上場熱身時受創的馬天尼利，傷勢沒有預期中嚴重。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

replies.msg:
阿迪達談托雷拉：

“我已經和托雷拉談過了，他在租借期開始的時候表現很好，但是現在他缺少上場的時間。這是有可能發生的，馬體會表現非常好，他們是西甲的第一名，當一隊球隊不斷贏球的時候，他就很難進入正選陣容。這是一個漫長的賽季，我了解盧卡斯的性格，他會繼續努力，讓我們看看會發生什麼。”

談加比爾：

“加比爾前幾天恢復訓練了，他因為隔離錯過了幾週訓練。現在情況好多了，我們希望他能在接下來的幾天和我們一起訓練，週四賽前會再進行評估。”

談史密夫路維 有球迷稱呼他為“"Croydon De Bruyne"” :

“還是叫他 Emile 吧，簡單點，這只是個開始，還有很多事情要做。我對他的表現和他在連續幾場比賽中表現出來的能力印象深刻，這在年輕球員身上是不常見的。

幾天前，當我們需要一種不同的能量和禁區內的威脅時，他來了，他做了我們所期望的，他進了球，這是我們一直在和他談論的事情。

這是一支由不同類型的球員組成的球隊，每個人都必須互相督促，努力讓彼此變得更好。每個人的貢獻都不一樣，因為每個球員都是不同的。”
